name: Shifted Darkness
description:
at June 30th 2022, a 18 year old employee Ray Morgan was tasked to work at a night-shift from his boss since his co-worker was sick, Ray was agitated about it but when along with it since he would get better pay since he's doing a night shift, however what Ray didn't know was that there going to be some.....unexpected events that will take place during the night shift.

Created by Pierre Fouche'

My first visual novel horror game, hope you enjoy......hehehehe - Pierre

WARNING

Blood, Gore, Abused (Mentioned) and Death
